# No Pillar Roundabout
A Cities: Skylines 2 Mod.
Disables roundabout update caused by bridge pillars hovering over intersections, by removing composition flag `Roundabout` from pillar prefabs.
## Support
Bug reports and feature requests can be made on the [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/ChromoXYX/NoPillarRoundabout/issues), or sent to [me@chromo.dev](mailto://me@chromo.dev).
## Usage
```bash dotnet restore dotnet build ```
DLL binaries will be copied to `AppData\LocalLow\Colossal Order\Cities Skylines II\Mods` automatically.
